tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies. The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create Compartment, VCN and MySQL HeatWave DB System while loading DB Data
Lab 2: Create Compute with MySQL Shell
Lab 3: Add HeatWave Cluster to the DB sytem
Lab 4: Load data into HeatWave Cluster and test
Lab 5: Develop MySQL HeatWave App with LAMP
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
